page.title: 13GOLF COURSES
page.content: {GOLF COURSES} Golf courses form a large part of the land use in our 4x3km area.There are two golf courses in our area.Golf course design is based on certain principles but each has its own character.The course which we concentrated on was{SELSDON PARK. } {COSTS: }Mon-Fri Â£8.50. Sat Â£13.50. Sun Â£15.00. {TIMES: }8.30-7.00 Mon-Fri.7.30-7.00 Sat-Sun. There is one 18 hole course.There are 2 bars,one in the clubhouse situated by the 10th hole and one in the hotel. The course is open to the public via an entrance near Sanderstead roundabout.Lessons are available from proffessionals.The course will close to the public in 1986.
